<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crossbow Ace](/Feats.aspx?ID=491) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 171 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a deep understanding of the crossbow. When you're wielding a crossbow and use [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10) or use Interact to reload your crossbow, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the damage roll on your next Strike with that crossbow. If the crossbow is a simple crossbow, also [increase the damage die size for that attack by one step](/Rules.aspx?ID=226). You must make the attack before the end of your next turn or these benefits are lost.
name: Crossbow Ace
